title: ‘I Blew up the Legs, but It Was a Good Day’: Pogačar Third, Takes Silver Lining from UAE Tour TT Ride
content:
Rivals beware, world champion is raring to go on Wednesday’s uphill finish: ‘It suits me very well’.

Read the full article at ‘I Blew up the Legs, but It Was a Good Day’: Pogačar Third, Takes Silver Lining from UAE Tour TT Ride on Velo.
author: sstokes
